attributes.action: Reverse the export of accounting jobs in the NHS to India
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Government is exporting entry level (apprenticeship) accounting jobs in the NHS to India. These jobs are desperately needed in areas of low employment. Mr Brown is talking about apprenticeships for 16 to 18 year olds but cannot support these jobs now. If our own Governemnt is exporting jobs what chance have we got?

rejection.details: Your petition is already on the website http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/NHSJoblosses/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
